title: How would the game look like if instead of 6 item slots, we had 10?

replies.body: games dont last long enough to get enough gold to get 10 items

SOmetimes they would, also everyone would always have space for wards.
And u got more space for item parts.

> [{quoted}](name=Trogmar,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zkqastJL,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2018-09-09T20:26:27.830+0000)
>
> {{champion:91}} {{item:1036}} {{item:1036}} {{item:1036}} {{item:1036}} {{item:1036}} {{item:1036}} {{item:1036}} {{item:1036}} {{item:1036}} {{item:1036}}

This seems legitimate lol
I am the law-ong swords
Maybe on veigar you would prefer spellbinder cause it's cheaper, gives the same ap and 10% for each spellbinder
Or you would go tank, as your ap scales anyway.
this is season 9 we have 10 item slots supports no longer use their skills  late game

not much different, considering income and such.. maybe people would build more small items (daggers, longswords, amplifying tomes, etc) but large complete items would still take just as long to build..
We'd have 6 unused slots instead of 2
Garbage game with 4 more items.
I think it’d be cool to have a RGM where that was a thing and hold from all sources was doubled. The chaos would be a nice change of pace.

Things would need to be rebalanced. Either all items would need to be nerfed, stats and cost wise, or gold income would need to be jacked up by almost double. 

There are very rare games where you can get a 7th item if you want to, and I've had a few where I could have gotten 8. But 10? Never. 

Although it would leave room for a control ward at all times...
I can imagine a mundo with 10 warmogs XD

It would be better to remove items entirely than let fed players get even more
Absolutely the same since games barely last enough for people to complete 6 items anyway.
I'd rather get a potion slot off to the side.
The way i play Thresh would be a whole lot harder since i buy a lot of active items (ingenious hunter OP) just trying to keep of them all
I don't think we would even get 10 items considering that games are pretty fast.
I would prefer ultimate tier recipes
broken
